oai_dc:dc.dc:title: First Synthesis of the alpha-L-Serine Linked Consensus Disaccharide of Neisseria gonorrhoeae and Neisseria meningitidis
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: JANA, S
EMMADI, M
KULKARNI, SS
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: SUGAR BUILDING-BLOCKS
INNER-CORE REGION
RARE-SUGAR
MENINGOCOCCAL DISEASE

VACCINE DEVELOPMENT

bacteria

pathogens

oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The first total synthesis of the alpha-L-serine linked consensus disaccharide of Neisseria gonorrhoeae and Neisseria meningitidis was carried out in six linear steps, with 20.6% overall yield.
